reg_pit.title: Apollo Forest Products Ltd. Exemption Regulation

change.changenote: Section 1 definitions of "biomass fuel processing project" and "biomass thermal generation facility" were added by BC Reg 61/2020, effective March 20, 2020.
Section 1 definition of "project" BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 61/2020, effective March 20, 2020.

bcl:definition.bcl:text: project means the project to construct a 40 MW biomass thermal generation facility approximately 6 km north of the authority's Fort St. James No. 2 Substation.

change.changenote: Section 2 (a) and (b) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 61/2020, effective March 20, 2020.

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: the provision of service respecting the transmission of electricity from the project to the authority's transmission system.

change.changenote: Section 2 (c) was added by BC Reg 61/2020, effective March 20, 2020.
